name: Kubernetes Deployment
description: A Deployment Stage with Kubernetes Setup
yaml:
spec:
  access: outside-cluster
  masterUrl: 'https://34.67.13.218'
  k8s-auth: 
  type: user-password
  spec: 
  username: admin
  password: kube_cluster_password
  cacert: 'secretRef:kube_cluster_cacert'
